attributes.action: Against petitions on dogs they say are dangerous ie staffordshire bull terriers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have a staffordshire bull terrier called Ace age 3 and she is ace!! she is good with other dogs cats rabits etc...she is good with my daughter age 3 who has disabilities and learning difficulties... its not the dogs its the owners...disgusted in seeing a petition of this nature on here.How can people say all staffordshire bull terriers are the same!! Its like saying all humans are the same. Please don't let these beautiful dogs get labelled. it's so not fare!! I'd invite all worried people into my home to change there opinions with no worries and she will make you think twice about this. Dangerous dog's are the makings of mankind with mistreatments... not a caring and loving home.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
